Nigeria 's Gross Domestic Product ( GDP ) grew by 4 percent in the third quarter of 2021 compared to the previous year . This statistic shows the Gini coefficient of after-tax income in Canada from 2000 to 2019 . In 2019 , the Gini coefficient of after-tax income in Canada was 0.30 . The Gini coefficient measures the deviation of the distribution of income ( or consumption ) among individuals or households in a given country from a perfectly equal distribution . It ranges from 0 ( perfect equality ) to 1 ( perfect inequality ) .

This statistic displays the reduction of other medications due to medical cannabis among Canadian patients in 2020 . During the survey , it was found that 41 percent of respondents with a medical document for cannabis reported that they reduced their use of anti-inflammatory medications because of medical cannabis .

According to a survey conducted in April 2020 , 47 percent of Canadian medical cannabis patients with a medical document stated that there was no impact on their purchasing due to COVID-19 . In comparison , 68 percent of patients without a medical document stated that there was no impact on their purchasing .
This statistic shows the use of fertilizer for agriculture in Algeria from 2015 to 2019 , by nutrient . In 2019 , the use of nitrogen ( N ) fertilizers amounted to approximately eight metric tons .

In July 2020 , exports from Suez port in Egypt amounted to approximately 315 million U.S. dollars . This was a significant increase compared to the previous month when exports were valued at around 248 million U.S. dollars . In total , exports from Egyptian ports reached nearly 2.16 billion U.S. dollars that month .

In July 2020 , exports from Dekheila port in Egypt amounted to approximately 195 million U.S. dollars . This was an increase of over 30 percent compared to the previous month . The total value of Egyptian exports amounted to nearly 2.14 billion U.S. dollars in July 2020 .

The coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic has caused many changes in people 's lives . In Poland , 82 percent of respondents were worried about the economic consequences of the pandemic . The second most common concern was the spread of the virus and its impact on the country .

In 2019 , around 36 percent of respondents in Romania agreed that each citizen should receive a guaranteed income from the state without work requirement . At the same time , 41 percent of respondents disagreed with this statement .

In 2020 , the production of glass fiber reinforced plastics ( GRP ) in Spain and Portugal amounted to approximately 141 thousand metric tons . This was a decrease of around 16 percent compared to the previous year .
In 2020 , Poles were most afraid of having their bank accounts broken into . The second most common concern was a home break-in .

This statistic shows the items bought second-hand by the French in clothing , textile and shoes category in 2018 . It appears that women 's clothing was the most popular item bought second-hand with 62 percent of respondents saying they bought this type of item second-hand .
The coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic has had a significant impact on the stock market . The CDA stock exchange rate in Poland increased by 48 percent between March 12 and 16 , 2020 .

This statistic shows the market capitalization of Barrick Gold from April 2019 to October 2020 . As of October 30 , 2020 , Barrick Gold had a market capitalization of approximately 63.4 billion Canadian dollars .
This statistic shows the share of child slaves along select routes between 1636 and 1867 . During this period , the British transported 20 percent of all child slaves from Angola to Brazil .

The majority of respondents in Poland stated that their religious commitment was the same as before the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic . However , 22 percent of respondents said they spent more time on prayer , meditation and other religious practices during the pandemic .

In 2020 , exports of natural rubber from Singapore amounted to approximately 91.8 million U.S. dollars . This constitutes a decrease in value by over 15 million U.S. dollars compared to the previous year .
In 2020 , around one third of respondents in Romania would like to work from home two or three days per week . Moreover , 15 percent of respondents would like to work from home four days per week .

This statistic presents the opinion of French parents on their daughter having so-called `` boy '' toys in 2019 . It appears that 70 percent of respondents stated that their daughter already has `` boy '' toys , while 60 percent of them said they intended to buy her `` boy '' toys .

This statistic shows the prevalence of mental distress among U.S. adults with a disability in 2018 , by gender . In that year , around 37 percent of female adults with a disability reported having experienced serious mental distress in the past 30 days .

As of August 2020 , around 38 percent of U.S. physicians were upset with the lack of reliable COVID-19 tests . The statistic illustrates the share of U.S. physicians who were upset for select reasons during the coronavirus pandemic as of August 2020 .

In June 2021 , around half of U.S. physicians experienced a reduction in income due to COVID-19 . This statistic illustrates the share of U.S. physicians who experienced select changes due to COVID-19 as of July 2020 and June 2021 .
As of May 2021 , around 67 percent of Brazilians stated that they planned to get vaccinated against COVID-19 . Meanwhile , only eight percent of respondents said they did not want to be vaccinated .

As of January 2022 , the total number of COVID-19 cases in Ukraine reached over 453 thousand . The highest number of infections was recorded in Kyiv , with nearly 460 thousand cases . The second most affected region was Odessa Oblast , where there were approximately 327 thousand cases .
In 2020 , imports and exports for Peru amounted to approximately 36 billion U.S. dollars . In that same year , the South American country 's trade deficit was around 14.5 billion U.S. dollars .

The majority of Poles believe that the government 's actions have a chance to limit the growth of the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) epidemic in Poland . Only 21 percent of respondents stated that they do not think so .

In 2020 , there were approximately 281 thousand marriages in Algeria . This was a decrease of over 60 thousand marriages from the previous year . The number of marriages peaked at around 394 thousand in 2013 .

As of March 1-4 , 2021 , 67 percent of Canadians said they would get vaccinated for COVID-19 as soon as one became available to them . This was an increase from 58 percent in February and 47 percent in January .

As of October 2020 , 89 percent of individuals in Great Britain believed that having people work from home would be effective in reducing the spread of coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) . This statistic shows the share of individuals who believe certain measures would be effective in reducing the spread of coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) in Great Britain as of October 2020 .
In 2019 , exports of agriculture , hunting , and fishery products from Algeria amounted to approximately 11.9 billion Algerian dinars . This was an increase compared to the previous year .

This statistic shows the leading agricultural products based on production value in Algeria in 2018 . In that year , dates were the most valuable agricultural product with a production value of approximately 3.7 billion U.S. dollars .
As of March 2020 , over half of Hungarians followed coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) related news more than other types of news . Only six percent of respondents did not follow any news at all .

This statistic displays the share of population with insufficient physical activity in selected countries in Latin America between 2001 and 2016 . During this period , Brazil had the highest rate of insufficient physical activity among its population at 48 percent .

This statistic shows the number of deaths in the shipbuilding industry in South Korea from 2015 to 2019 , by work experience . During this five year period , the majority of deaths occurred among workers with less than six months ' experience in the industry . In 2019 , there were 32 deaths among workers with less than six months ' experience .

As of March 2020 , Italy was the country where Romanian nationals who tested positive for coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) had travelled to before the outbreak . The number of such cases amounted to 35 percent of all infected Romanians .

The coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) outbreak is expected to have a significant impact on the Romanian economy . According to the single-hit scenario , real GDP growth in Romania is expected to decrease by 5.7 percent in 2020 and increase by 4.6 percent in 2021 . The double-hit scenario assumes that the country will experience a second wave of infections in 2021 , which would lead to a decrease of 8.3 percent in 2020 and an increase of 1.9 percent in 2021 .
The number of direct jobs created by the app economy in the European Union increased from 520 thousand in January 2016 to 673 thousand as of July 2019 .

Between August 2019 and April 2021 , the consumer price index ( CPI ) for food and non-alcoholic beverages in Ghana increased by 36.4 percent . The most significant increase was recorded for vegetables , tubers , plantains , and cocoyams , with an increase of 37.5 percent . The least significant increase was recorded for sugar , salt , tea , coffee , and vegetable juice , with an increase of 2.8 percent .
This statistic shows the unemployment rate in Algeria from 2010 to 2019 , by gender . In 2019 , around 20.7 percent of the female population aged between 15 and 24 years were unemployed .

In 2020 , close family were the most common recipients of Christmas presents in Hungary . More than 90 percent of Hungarians bought gifts for their close family members . The second most common group to receive Christmas presents were friends , with over one fifth of respondents buying gifts for them .

According to a survey conducted in 2020 , 42 percent of U.S. adults agreed that e-cigarettes are less harmful than traditional cigarettes . In contrast , 58 percent of respondents strongly disagreed with this statement .

This statistic shows the results of a survey on the confidence level in business ability to understand cyber threats worldwide as of April 2019 , by industry . During the survey period it was found that 59 percent of respondents from the manufacturing industry were fairly confident in their businesses ' ability to understand cyber threats .

In 2020 , most requests to delist website content from Google in Denmark were due to insufficient information . This was followed by requests regarding missing names and professional information . The number of requests to delist website content from Google in Denmark increased significantly over the last years .

This statistic displays the volume of French exports and imports of used textile articles and rags between 2015 and 2019 , in tonnes . It shows that the volume of exports increased from 1.48 million tonnes in 2015 to 1.76 million tonnes in 2019 .

This statistic shows the number of clinical trial starts for novel heart failure drugs in the United States from 2009 to 2018 , by stage . In 2018 , there were four Phase I clinical trial starts for novel heart failure drugs in the U.S.

The COVID-19 pandemic has caused a significant increase in sales of hygiene and household products in Argentina . Sales of antiseptics increased by 370 percent between March 2 and March 8 compared to February 24 and March 1 .

In 2021 , there were approximately 31.4 million registered mobile money customers in Uganda . This was an increase from around 27.5 million registered mobile money customers in the previous year . Mobile money is a form of electronic money that can be stored on a mobile device and used for financial transactions such as payments or remittances .

The Queen 's Gambit is an American television series based on the 2013 novel of the same name by Walter Tevis . The series premiered in the United States on Netflix on November 27 , 2020 . In Mexico , the series was titled Gambito de Dama and was released on December 18 , 2020 . The series has been very popular in Mexico , with searches for the show increasing significantly since its release .
In 2020 , proved natural gas reserves in Angola amounted to approximately 301 billion cubic meters . This was a decrease of around 41 billion cubic meters from the previous year .
In 2020 , the demand for natural gas in Angola reached approximately 821 million cubic meters . This was an increase of around 13 percent compared to the previous year .

In the academic year 2019/2020 , there were more than 33 thousand foreign students from the European Union enrolled in higher education degrees in Spain . Latin America and Caribbean was the second most common origin of foreign students in Spanish universities with over 17 thousand students .

Shin-Etsu Chemical Co. Ltd . is one of the world 's largest manufacturers of silicones , and is headquartered in Tokyo , Japan . In fiscal year 2020 , Shin-Etsu employed approximately 24,100 people worldwide .

This statistic shows the leading internet activities among young people in Norway in 2020 . During the survey period it was found that 98 percent of respondents used instant messaging services such as WhatsApp , Facebook Messenger or Skype .
This statistic shows the foreign population in selected European countries in 1960 , 1976 and 1990 . In 1990 , there were approximately 5,248 thousand foreigners living in Germany .

The statistic depicts the increase in time spent video gaming during the COVID-19 pandemic among PC gamers in the United States as of June 2020 , by genre . During the survey period it was found that PC gamers who played fighting games increased their gaming time by 23 percent .

In March 2020 , nearly half of Polish cosmetics exporters stated that the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic had a negative impact on their exports . Only six percent of respondents reported that the pandemic had no impact on their export activity .

As of January 2022 , Lääne maakond had the highest number of coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) cases in Estonia . The number of confirmed cases per 100 thousand people in this region was over 4,500 . Harju maakond followed with nearly 4,200 cases per 100 thousand people .

This statistic shows private consumption as a percentage of GDP in Vietnam from 2012 to 2020 . Private consumption accounted for approximately 68.4 percent of Vietnam 's gross domestic product in 2020 .

According to a survey conducted in Russia in April 2020 , 91 percent of respondents supported introducing mandatory wearing masks in public places . At the same time , only 11 percent of Russians were in favor of introducing a distance requirement of 1.5-2 meters between people in public places .
The average retail price of wheat flour in Russia increased by 7.5 Russian rubles per kilogram between 2017 and 2020 . In 2020 , one kilogram of wheat flour cost an average of 38.9 Russian rubles .

In 2020 , around half of Russians agreed that the country should return to the times before perestroika . The share of respondents who agreed with this statement has fluctuated between 47 and 54 percent since 1995 .

This statistic displays the share of U.S. adults aged 65 years and older who had flu vaccinations from 2009 to 2018 , by race/ethnicity . In 2018 , around 59 percent of black adults aged 65 years and older had flu vaccinations .

According to a survey conducted in September 2020 , 36 percent of caregivers in the United States stated that their responsibilities had increased due to COVID-19 . In comparison , 54 percent of respondents said that their responsibilities stayed about the same as before the pandemic .

According to a December 2019 survey of U.S. adults , 38 percent of respondents stated that they cyber stalked their ex or current partner because they were just curious . Another 45 percent of respondents stated that they did not trust their ex or current partner and suspected they were checking in on them .
During Black Friday 2019 , the category of consoles reported the highest growth in clicks compared to an average Friday . The category of headphones was ranked second with a growth of 897 percent .

In 2020 , French consumers were more advanced in their Christmas gift shopping and preparation than last year . This was mainly due to the fact that they made their purchases before the delivery times would be extended and because they wanted to avoid the rush in December .
This statistic shows the forecasted electricity generation in France in 2050 , by energy source . It is expected that nuclear power will generate 184 terawatt hours of electricity in France in 2050 .
